data.enText: to become or make sth become smaller, weaker, less important, etc.

data.chText: 减少某事物的风险 / 影响 / 效果
data.enText: to lessen the risk/impact/effect of sth

ex.chText: 当地政府已经采取有效措施减少失业人数。
ex.enText: The local government has adopted effective measures to decrease unemployment.

ex.chText: 公司计划减少生产成本。
ex.enText: The company planned to diminish the cost of production.

ex.chText: 由于缺少降雨，池塘里的水逐渐减少。
ex.enText: Water in the pond gradually diminished due to lack of rainfall.

ex.chText: 他的评论就是为了贬低她的发现的重要性。
ex.enText: His comments were only said to diminish the importance of her discoveries.

synonyms.bx: 指大小、数量不断减小，也可引申为贬低某事物的重要性或价值。

ex.chText: 听音乐的时候，她的焦虑减轻了。
ex.enText: Her anxiety lessened while listening to the music.

ex.chText: 进行锻炼可降低患心脏病的风险。
ex.enText: Exercise lessens the risk of heart disease.

ex.chText: 该计划降低了汽车污染的影响。
ex.enText: The program has lessened the effects of car pollution.

synonyms.bx: 指程度、规模等减少，也可指降低某事物的可能性、影响等。

ex.chText: 我们应该采取各种措施来降低物价。
ex.enText: We should take measures to reduce the price.

ex.chText: 最近宣布了一项降低犯罪率的计划。
ex.enText: A plan to reduce crime was announced recently.

synonyms.bx: 指降低价格、数量、规模等。

ex.chText: 改善城市拥塞状况的计划
ex.enText: plans to ease congestion in the city

ex.chText: 这种药可以减轻你的疼痛。
ex.enText: This kind of medicine can ease your pain.

synonyms.bx: 指减轻事情的恶劣程度、身心痛苦等。

ex.chText: 他的到来减轻了她的恐惧。
我们希望这一声明会减轻公众的担忧。
ex.enText: We hope this statement will allay the public's concern.

synonyms.bx: 通常指减轻恐惧、担心、怀疑等。

ex.chText: 据说这种药物能够缓解疼痛。
ex.enText: It is said that this medicine can alleviate pain.
I could only alleviate the sorrow by drinking.

synonyms.bx: 指减轻疼痛、痛苦、难度等。

ex.chText: 这种药可以立刻减轻痛苦。
ex.enText: This medicine can lessen pain in no time.

ex.chText: 她试图淡化他在工作中的重要性。
ex.enText: She tried to lessen his importance at work.

synonyms.bx: 指减轻痛苦，或降低风险、重要性等。

tr: decrease in size, extent, or range
example: The amount of homework decreased towards the end of the semester
her weight fell to under a hundred pounds
his voice fell to a whisper

value.def: If something lessens or you lessen it, it becomes smaller in size, amount, degree, or importance.

example.ex: He is used to a lot of attention from his wife, which will inevitably lessen when the baby is born...
example.tran: 他习惯了妻子对他的百般关注，但孩子出生后这种关注就会不可避免地减少。

example.ex: Make sure that your immunisations are up to date to lessen the risk of serious illness.
example.tran: 要确保接种最新的疫苗，以降低患上严重疾病的危险。

example.ex: ...increased trade and a lessening of tension on the border.
example.tran: 边界地区贸易的增长和紧张气氛的缓和
